example[0]: Open-sea fish lay several million eggs each breeding season.
definition[1]: the activity of keeping animals or plants in order to produce animals or plants that have particular qualities
example[2]: Benson took great care in selecting breeding stock  (=animals you keep to breed from).
definition[2]: the fact of coming from a family of high rank and having polite social behaviour
example[3]: The young lieutenant had an air of wealth and good breeding.
